Text:
Vera Lynn is wonderful singing those beautiful songs! What a voice!
Thank you very much my dear nightissuchproximity.
thank you. These sound great and the download was pretty fast (overnight) for such a nice collection. Will keep seeding. Hope others get to enjoy some of these great old songs.

This is a bloody mess which does not correspond to any commercially produced album, let alone the one shown.
Give it a miss and look somewhere else.
